Description:
After further review we have decided not to proceed with this change at this time. We apologize for any inconvenience. Microsoft 365 Copilot brings Viva Connections cards to conversations. When a card is relevant for a specific topic, the card will surface in the conversation chat and users will be able to interact with it directly from Microsoft 365 Copilot without interrupting the user's flow.
GA date: September CY2025
Preview date: March CY2024
Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Viva Connections cards in Microsoft 365 Copilots
